projects.title: kordis.cloud Main Page
projects.bodyText:
- Engineered the cloud backend ensuring scalable, efficient operations.
 - Integrated React for dynamic, customizable front-end interactions.
 - Leveraged a robust AWS architecture including S3, DynamoDB, and more.

projects.title: Coming Soon Page
projects.bodyText:
- Customized a Next.js-based 'Coming Soon' page to enhance user engagement.
 - Utilized AWS Lambda and API Gateway to handle backend processes efficiently.
 - Integrated AWS S3 and DynamoDB for scalable storage and database solutions.

projects.title: Plants vs Animals
projects.bodyText:
- A tower defence game developed using Unity3D, focusing on gameplay with strategic elements.
 - Deployed and managed the game on Google Play, optimizing for various devices.
 - Implemented Unity Monetization to optimize in-game advertising.

projects.title: Projects API
projects.bodyText:
- Dynamically manage and display a portfolio of software projects.
 - Uses Django and DRF for the backend API.
 - Dockerized application with Postgres integration.
 - Utilizes GitHub Actions for automated testing, linting, and Docker image builds.

projects.title: Building a metrics dashboard
projects.bodyText:
- Setup and verified monitoring installation in Kubernetes cluster.
 - Integrated Grafana for real-time visualizations and dashboards.
 - Implemented Prometheus and Jaeger for monitoring and tracing application performance.

projects.title: TechTrends Project
projects.bodyText:
- Online news sharing platform for cloud-native ecosystem.
- Built with Python Flask and SQLite.
- Dockerized application.
- Deployed on Kubernetes using Helm and ArgoCD.

projects.title: UdaConnect Project
projects.bodyText:
- Built with Flask and SQLAlchemy.
- Uses PostgreSQL for data storage.
- Microservices architecture with gRPC and Kafka.
- Deployed on a Kubernetes cluster using Vagrant and VirtualBox.

projects.title: Serverless Quiz API
projects.bodyText:
- Built with Node.js and AWS Lambda.
- Utilizes the Serverless framework.
- Implements CRUD operations for quiz items.
- Uses DynamoDB for data storage and S3 for file attachments.

projects.title: My Reads
projects.bodyText:
- Categorizing books into shelves. 
- Provides search functionality. 
- Interacts with a backend API server and client library.

projects.title: Would You Rather
projects.bodyText:
- Built with React and Redux.
- Lets users play the 'Would You Rather?' game.
- Users can answer questions, post questions, and see the ranking on the leaderboard.
- Features state-based user authentication and poll management.
